#summary Features planned for the next release

=Partial to-do list for version 0.5.0=

The 0.5 version will add new features. As there are many requested features, emphasis is given to low-hanging fruit.

==Features and fixes available in the 0.5.pre3 prerelease==

  * Add search tab.
  * Enable searching the music collection by typing characters in any view (auto-search).
  * Add support for HTTP streams, e.g. web radio.
  * Add a menu for viewing, enabling and disable outputs on the server.
  * Add support in media keys on the keyboard (play/pause, next, previous, stop, volume up and down).
  * Display untitled songs by file name instead of as "Unknown Song".
  * Add a shuffle function to the playlist's context menu. 
  * Make the settings window appear automatically the first time Auremo is started.
  * Fix disabled slider visual.
  * Fix play status in status bar.
  * Fix song length display when disconnected or inactive.
  * Shrink minimum window size to 960 x 640 for the benefit of 720p users.

==Committed features and fixes==
 
  * Add support for non-latin characters in collection auto-search.
  * Add support for renaming saved playlists.
  * Many usability improvements, bug fixes and refactorizations.

== Bugs ==

  * (no currently known bugs)

== Features to add ==

These features will be added before the release.

  * Bugfixes, polish, refactoring.
